topics.body:
In a few hours, I have to leave for an airport.
In another few hours , I have to get on a 5 hour plane.
Then I have to land and be driven to my hotel which is a hour drive.
Why? Because between the airport and my hotel _there is a goddamn mountain in my way._

I love going on holiday, but the actual 'travel' part makes me want to fucking shoot myself.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ec559b6368720219320200#post_53ec559b6368720219320200
I remember when i last traveled to america. The ten hour flight was lovely, and the huge jet lag made me lose my appetite and i couldn't eat anything for three days. Finally i managed to shamble into a nearby ihop and devoured a shitload of pancakes, and ended up being sick for the rest of the day.

Then i slowly returned to normal.
